headline: GE Vernova Soars 90% YTD. Here’s Why GEV Stock’s Rally Isn’t Over.
summary: GEV’s strong backlog growth, rising global demand, and multiple tailwinds from electrification and decarbonization will support future growth.

headline: Melius Bullish on GE Vernova (GEV), Sees Strong Upside as AI Boosts Energy Needs
summary: GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) is one of the AI Stocks You Should Not Ignore. On September 15, Melius analyst Rob Wertheimer upgraded the stock to “Buy” from Neutral with a $740 price target. The research firm sees upside to estimates. In an investor note, the analyst mentioned that the stock is up 5x from the spin, […]
